Configuration.Name: Alma Item Hold Request
Configuration.Author: Robert Wilson, University of Minnesota
Configuration.Description: Scans a barcode to lookup an item in Alma and places a request (hold) to route it to ILL office.

Setting.name: Alma API URL
Setting.Description: The URL to the Alma API (e.g., https://api-na.hosted.exlibrisgroup.com/almaws/v1/).

Setting.name: Alma API Key
Setting.Description: API key used for interacting with the Alma API (Requires Read/Write permissions).

Setting.name: ILL Request User ID
Setting.Description: The Alma User ID (primary identifier) of the pseudopatron for whom hold will be placed (e.g., the internal ILL department account).

Setting.name: Pickup Library Code
Setting.Description: The Alma Library Code where the item should be delivered (e.g., RES_SHARE).

Setting.name: Field to Perform Lookup With
Setting.Description: The field that contains the barcode.
